name: Matching Black Inventors
description:
This is a great game to exercise and challenge your memory, while learning some history. Discover and learn about many of the inventions that Black Inventors have given to the world.

This is the classic memory card matching game with an educational twist. This game is perfect for all ages, children and adults.

Game Features
-Match pairs of cards with images of the inventions
-Different levels of difficulty (easy, medium, and hard)
-After a match is made, a brief history lesson is given.
-Time clock and leaderboard
-25 inventions are included
-89 inventions can be unlocked in the pro version
